data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexander A., Minor, Maria A. (2018): New species and a new record of the mite family Scutacaridae (Acari: Heterostigmata) from alpine New Zealand. Zootaxa 4508 (4): 507-550, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4508.4.2|32 occurrences
